After sun acquisition, one of the on-board antennas is directed towards the earth by highly sensitive earth sensors. The earth is acquired, and this antenna con足 tinues to track the earth during the entire period of communication. Should it become necessary to switch to the standby antenna, all that is required is to rotate the body of the satellite 1800 about its longitudinal axis, using the gas-jet stabilizers.
